lead_paragraph: Sylvester Stallone, thrilled to be back as an Oscar contender for the first time in 40 years, said on Monday he had thought twice about taking part in the Oscar ceremony because of the uproar over the scarcity of black talent in the contest.

headline.main: Thrilled 'Creed' Nominee Stallone Thought Twice About Going to Oscars
headline.print_headline: Thrilled 'Creed' Nominee Stallone Thought Twice About Going to Oscars

snippet: Sylvester Stallone, thrilled to be back as an Oscar contender for the first time in 40 years, said on Monday he had thought twice about taking part in the Oscar ceremony because of the uproar over the scarcity of black talent in the contest....
